meanings.sent1: She decided to preinvite her friends to the party next week.
meanings.sent2: They always preinvite guests to their annual barbecue.
meanings.sent3: The cat preinvited the mouse to a game of hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: The sun preinvites the flowers to open up and bloom.
meanings.sent5: The teacher preinvited the students to participate in the science fair.

meanings.definition: Making someone feel welcome before an event.
meanings.sent1: He preinvited his new neighbors to the neighborhood potluck.
meanings.sent2: The team preinvites all players to join the championship celebration.
meanings.sent3: The dog preinvited the cat to share its cozy bed.
meanings.sent4: The ocean preinvites surfers with its big waves.
meanings.sent5: The company preinvites employees to a fun team-building retreat.
